list.name: TAKE-COVER
list.description: Ruffs throws down x sandbags as cover. Each one has x% of Ruffs' max health.
list.descriptionHtml: Ruffs throws down x sandbags as cover. Each one has x% of Ruffs' max health.

list.name: AIR-SUPPORT
list.description: Ruffs calls a barrage around the nearest opponent, dealing x damage with each hit.
list.descriptionHtml: Ruffs calls a barrage around the nearest opponent, dealing x damage with each hit.
